Posts.Content: Jul 11, 2010 08:58AM jsm1946 wrote: Hi Renrel- Supposed to start TC next week, and have been pondering the value of going through all this for a 7% benefit.  Thanks for your take on the experience.  Three out of three oncologists agreed that this is the right protocol for me.  Guess my question now is how to minimize the potential side effects of the drugs.  No discussion with oncologist regarding ice packs for nail issues or hair loss.............feeling like I am getting most of my info from reading discussion boards.  Thanks for your input and glad you did well and continue to do so. core needle 4/7/10, lumpectomy 5/12/10, ER+ PR- HER- stage 1, grade 3, .9cm, lymph node negative, oncotype score 30
Posts.Title: TC Chemo really not bad so far KGBinDC KGBinDC
